metadata.title: CVE-2024-4367 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A type check was missing when handling fonts in PDF.js, which would allowarbitrary JavaScript execution in the PDF.js context. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 126, Firefox ESR < 115.11, and Thunderbird < 115.11.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
